title: Disable a Discontinued Product
description: A product has been discontinued by the manufacturer and needs to be removed from the storefront.

tasks.description: Locate the product by its SKU.
Change the product's status to 'disabled' or 'archived' so it is no longer visible or searchable on the website.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully hides the product from the storefront.

tasks.description: Optionally, set up a redirect from the old product URL to a relevant category page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prevents customers from hitting a 404 error page.
